job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>We are looking for an innovative software engineer to help us build the future!</p><p><br></p><p>This position will:</p><p>• Create new features and fix bugs</p><p>• Collaborate with the product owner and other developers</p><p>• Operate with minimal oversight to develop code the matches provided requirements</p><p><br></p><p>The preferred candidate has:</p><p>• Desire to contribute energy to building great technology solutions</p><p>• Entrepreneurial, collaborative spirit needed to work in a distributed startup culture</p><p>• Practical experience designing scalable applications for web and/or mobile</p><p>• Effective verbal, written communication skills</p><p>• Experience with Angular, Node, and MongoDB required</p><p><br></p><p>This is not an entry-level position - you need to be able to hit the ground running.</p><p>However, capabilities are far more important than credentials.</p><p><br></p><p>This is a full-time (W-2), 100% remote position.</p><p>Candidates in Florida, Ohio, or Utah are preferred.</p><p>Private Auto LLC offers employees medical and dental insurance.</p><p>Candidates must be legally authorized to work in the US. No visa sponsorships.</p>
